languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс приближается и заглядывает вам в глаза. В его взгляде — неприкрытое, опаляющее бешенство.{/n} "Что ты натворил{mf||а}?! Годы работы... жизни агентов, положенные на поиск тайн культа... ты уничтожил{mf||а} все это одним ударом!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс приближается и заглядывает вам в глаза. В его взгляде — неприкрытое, опаляющее бешенство.{/n} "Что ты натворил{mf||а}?! Годы работы... жизни агентов, положенные на поиск тайн Культа... ты уничтожил{mf||а} все это одним ударом!"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix comes closer and stares at you, his eyes gleaming with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс приближается и заглядывает вам в глаза. В его взгляде — неприкрытое, опаляющее бешенство.{/n} "Что ты натворил{mf||а}?! Годы работы... жизни агентов, положенные на поиск тайн культа... ты уничтожил{mf||а} все это одним ударом!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix comes closer and holds your gaze. His eyes gleam with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the Cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

{n}Heinrix comes closer and holds your gaze. His eyes gleam with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the Cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

{n}Heinrix comes closer and holds your gaze. His eyes gleam with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the Cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

{n}Heinrix comes closer and stares at you, his eyes gleaming with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the Cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

languages.text: {n}海因里希朝你走了过来。他死死地盯着你，眼神中闪烁着毫不掩饰的怒火。{/n}“你到底干了什么？这么多年的心血……那么多特工为了揭开邪教的秘密献出了生命……可你转眼间却把这一切都毁了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix comes closer and stares at you, his eyes gleaming with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希朝你走了过来。他死死地盯着你，眼神中闪烁着毫不掩饰的怒火。{/n}“你到底干了什么？这么多年的心血……那么多特工为了揭开邪教的秘密献出了生命……可你转眼间却把这一切都毁了！”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se acerca a ti y te mira con una furia abrasadora.{/n} «¿Pero qué haces? Años de trabajo... las vidas de los agentes sacrificados para descubrir los secretos del Culto... ¡Lo has echado todo a perder de un plumazo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix comes closer and stares at you, his eyes gleaming with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se acerca a ti y te mira con una furia abrasadora.{/n} «¿Pero qué haces? Años de trabajo... las vidas de los agentes sacrificados para descubrir los secretos del Culto... ¡Lo has echado todo a perder de un plumazo!».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたに近づいてじっと見つめてくる。その目には燃え盛るような怒りが輝いていた。{/n}「何をしたんです？教団の秘密を暴くために犠牲となったエージェントたちの長年の仕事…それを一瞬で破壊したのだぞ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix comes closer and stares at you, his eyes gleaming with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたに近づいてじっと見つめてくる。その目には燃え盛るような怒りが輝いていた。{/n}「何をしたんです？教団の秘密を暴くために犠牲となったエージェントたちの長年の仕事…それを一瞬で破壊したのだぞ！」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kommt näher und starrt dich an, in seinen Augen funkelt nackter, brennender Zorn.{/n} "Was habt Ihr getan? Jahrelange Arbeit ... das Leben von Agenten geopfert, um die Geheimnisse des Kults zu ergründen ... und Ihr habt alles mit einem einzigen Schlag zerstört!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix comes closer and stares at you, his eyes gleaming with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix kommt näher und starrt dich an, in seinen Augen funkelt nackter, brennender Zorn.{/n} "Was habt Ihr getan? Jahrelange Arbeit ... das Leben von Agenten geopfert, um die Geheimnisse des Kults zu ergründen ... und Ihr habt alles mit einem einzigen Schlag zerstört!"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix s'approche de vous et vous toise, une lueur de rage pure dans ses yeux.{/n} « Qu'avez-vous fait ? Des années de travail... Tous ces agents qui se sont sacrifiés pour percer les secrets du Culte... et vous avez anéanti tous nos efforts d'un seul coup ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix comes closer and stares at you, his eyes gleaming with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix s'approche de vous et vous toise, une lueur de rage pure dans ses yeux.{/n} « Qu'avez-vous fait ? Des années de travail... Tous ces agents qui se sont sacrifiés pour percer les secrets du Culte... et vous avez anéanti tous nos efforts d'un seul coup ! »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix yaklaşıp gözlerini sana dikiyor. Bakışlarında saf, kavurucu bir öfke var.{/n} "Ne yaptın sen? Yılların emeği... Tarikatın sırlarını açığa çıkarmak için feda edilen onca can... Bir çırpıda hepsini hiç ettin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix comes closer and stares at you, his eyes gleaming with naked, scorching rage.{/n} "What have you done? Years of work... agents' lives sacrificed to uncover the cult's secrets... and you destroyed it all in one fell swoop!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix yaklaşıp gözlerini sana dikiyor. Bakışlarında saf, kavurucu bir öfke var.{/n} "Ne yaptın sen? Yılların emeği... Tarikatın sırlarını açığa çıkarmak için feda edilen onca can... Bir çırpıda hepsini hiç ettin!"
